controls

Click - Photon - or - Electron - to select your robot. Use the sliders above to set each motor to its individual desired direction and speed. Click GO to apply. Click STOP to make the robot come to a complete stop. Click FORWARDS or BACKWARDS to quickly make the robot move in the desired direction. Click CLOCKWISE or COUNTERWISE to quickly make the robot rotate in the desired direction.

desktop controls

To make the robot move forwards, press the UP ARROW. To move backwards. press the DOWN ARROW. To turn right, clockwise, press the RIGHT ARROW. To turn left, counterclockwise, press the LEFT ARROW. Press SHIFT to stop the robot's movement. Press ENTER to toggle the robot's weapon.
